**This is a comprehensive Integrated Development Environment (IDE) specifically designed for Lua programming.**

offering developers a streamlined and efficient workspace for writing, testing, and debugging Lua code.
The project draws its inspiration from the minimalist philosophy of the Lite text editor, embracing a lightweight architecture while providing essential development tools.
By combining the simplicity and speed of Lite with features tailored for Lua development, this IDE aims to deliver an optimal balance between
functionality and performance, making it an ideal choice for both beginners learning Lua and experienced developers seeking a fast,
responsive coding environment.
